name: Parking Paradise Re-Deux
description:
Background

I was working on doing Parking Paradise again but improved. This is just a prototype/ verticle slice that was cancelled in April 2021. I am making it public in the hopes of generating feedback on my skills up to that point as well as a nice portfolio piece.

Features
  • Ten levels
  • Controller support for Xbox and PS4 controllers.
  • Save system
Future Plans

No more future plans for this project as of May 2021. The watermark on the titlescreen was when it was shown to colleagues internally to give an impression of a verticle slice.

Final words

There are only ten levels in the "city" area. All the "locked" areas were placeholders and were never meant to exist beyond that.

*A controller is recommended for the best gameplay experience **PS4 and Switch Pro controllers may require configuration via Steam or an external program for Windows to recognise them.
